name: Alligator Mix
description:
Alligator Alley is a math learning game for the Apple II.

The player controls a large alligator on the left of the screen, whose mouth can open and close. Math equations quickly approach from the right, and a possible answer appears on the alligator's belly. The goal is to eat the equations that fulfill the answer on the belly and not eat the incorrect equations. The player receives a score every 10 questions.
alsoFor: Apple II, Commodore 64, TI-99/4A | Combined View
